App Description: This app was designed to quickly identify if an item is unsafe to consume by using a barcode scanner on a device you will never be without. This app was not designed to identify whether to item is safe to consume.
Directions: Upon opening the application, accept the disclaimer and enter your all of your allergies in the settings. When you come across a product you would like to test to see if it contains one of your listed allergies press the scanner button and hold the barcode of the product half an arms length away from the scanner. The camera on the phone will autofocus by itself, and you just need to hold it there. Once the scanner identifies the item, and reveals whether you may be able to consume it make sure to double check the ingredients list if the item says its safe.
Disclaimer: This app is designed to be a suggestion and should not under any circumstances take place of actually reading labels and ingredients. If the app says your item may or does contain substances you are allergic to DO NOT CONSUME THE PRODUCT. If the app says the item may be safe,you MUST READ THE LABEL before using. If the database does not recognize the item you have,DO NOT CONSUME THE ITEM. In addition the database has shown to be accurate, but may still be have errors, so do not rely on the app in life or death situations.
